      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void buildModel()
      Creates a model for the optimization A CP model is composed of the variables + a search procedure This method should set the values for objective and dfs such that solve() can be called afterwards

      • buildModel

        public abstract void buildModel()
        Creates a model for the optimization A CP model is composed of the variables + a search procedure This method should set the values for objective and dfs such that solve() can be called afterwards

      • solve

        public void solve()
        Runs the full search defined in the dfs

      • solve

        public SearchStatistics solve(boolean verbose)
        Runs the full search defined in the dfs and possibly prints each found solution
        Parameters:
        verbose - if true, prints the objective value each time a solution is found

      • solve

        public SearchStatistics solve(java.util.function.Predicate<SearchStatistics> limit)
        Runs the search defined in the dfs
        Parameters:
        limit - a predicate called at each node that stops the search when it becomes true

      • solve

        public SearchStatistics solve(boolean verbose,
                              java.util.function.Predicate<SearchStatistics> limit)
        Runs the search defined in the dfs and possibly prints each found solution
        Parameters:
        verbose - if true, prints the objective value each time a solution is found
        limit - a predicate called at each node that stops the search when it becomes true
        Returns:
        statistics related to the search
